All Projects

  • Weathery App - Weathery - Ionic Mobile Weather App
    Weather app written in TypeScript using Ionic and Angular and served by Node.JS. The app is wrapped in cordova and can be exported to a .apk or a .ipa for android and apple respectively. The weather app utilizes the Weather Underground API from the Weather Channel to supply data about the weather from different states and cities

    This GitHub Repo
  • Alfre-Cation - AlfreCation CodeIgniter-PHP Weather App
    Weather application written in the CodeIgniter PHP Framework. Titled "AlfreCation" for the college town that I am/was based out of for my Undergraduate education, Alfred, NY, the purpose of this was to highlight possible "vacation spots" in the area. However, the humor in this is that since this is a small "stranger-things" kinda town, there ain't really any viable places to vacations. So, the Western-New York area will suffice.

    This GitHub Repo
  • NotBC News Feed - NBC AJAX-PHP RSS Feed
    Created a web based view to display NBC news headlines for the day. There is functionality to search through the headline text with a search bar, and thanks to JQuery, when clicking on the only button on the page, the "showStaggeredList" function animates the population of the page with the listings of News Stories from NBC

    This GitHub Repo
  • Foody - Ruby On Rails - SQLite Restaurant Review CRUD
    Created a restaurant review application with Ruby on Rails and gem dependencies. Functionality included being able to authenticate users to write reviews of restaurants, edit their own user accounts, edit the reviews that they wrote and not others' reviews, and being able to authenticate user accounts with email activation. *If there is an email server present

    This GitHub Repo
  • Happy Thoughts - Ajax PHP MySQL CRUD
    Created an application that was web-based and mobile-friendly that demonstrated ajax search functionality, php mvc, databinding to a phpMyAdmin server and allowing for Create, Read, Update, and Delete functionality.

    This GitHub Repo
